page_content:
4|  Lattice Semiconductor
Our CommitmentsEnvironmentalSocialGovernanceWe prioritize environmental consciousness across our product development, our physical footprint, and our supply chain partnership.We foster a collaborative, diverse, inclusive, and innovative work environment and invest in giving back to our local communities.We hold ourselves to the highest ethical standards, following applicable laws and best practices with transparency and integrity.
Awards & RecognitionLattice ranks alongside other companies dedicated to innovation and sustainable excellence.
Key Highlights
Lattice has actively increased the diversity of our Board, leadership team, and across the company.Lattice employee turnover is 32% lower than the industry average.Achieved at company headquarters between Q1 2020 and Q1 2022.Could be powered based on the energy savings our customers gain by choosing Lattice FPGAs.
